did.head: Overview
did.abstract: Primarily personal correspondence with former students and friends regarding their writings and her life at Stanford. Also includes naturalization and citizenship papers of her father, James Mirrielees, and her own birth certificate. Correspondents include Bernard De Voto, Wallace Stegner and Harry Bush.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Sketch
bioghist.p: Mirrielees was Professor of English at Stanford 1909-1944, emeritus 1944-1962.

scopecontent.head: Description of the Collection
scopecontent.p: Collection primarily contains personal correspondence with former students and friends regarding their writings and her life at Stanford, along with naturalization and citizenship papers of her father, James Mirrielees, and her own birth certificate. Correspondents include Avis De Voto, Bernard De Voto, Mary Stegner, Wallace Stegner, and Harry Bush.
